Description: Active items don't charge when clearing rooms. Instead, they're charged by dealing damage to enemies.

Name: A Bar of Soap
Description: Gives Isaac +0.5 Tears and +0.2 Shot Speed.

Name: A Pound of Flesh
Description: Devil deals now cost   Coins,  Shop items now cost health, and consumables in shops are free but surrounded by spikes.

Name: Act of Contrition
Description: Increases tears and grants an   Eternal Heart. Allows  Angel Rooms to appear even if a Devil Deal has been taken before. Reduces the Devil/Angel room chance penalty for taking Red heart damage.

Name: Akeldama
Description: While in an uncleared room, Isaac forms a trail of bloody tears that drags behind him, bursting and dealing damage upon contact with enemies.

Name: Almond Milk
Quote: DMG down + tears up + you feel nutty
Description: Quadruples fire rate, with x0.3 damage multiplier. Tears are given random worm trinket effects.

Name: Astral Projection
Description: Causes Isaac to turn into a ghost if he gets hit while in an uncleared room, giving him flight and spectral tears and blocking the next hit he takes.

Name: Azazel's Rage
Description: Isaac builds rage every time a room is cleared. After four rooms, fires a large Brimstone laser when entering the next room.

Name: Battery Pack
Description: Recharges Isaac's currently held active item and drops 2-4 batteries.

Name: Belly Jelly
Description: Causes enemies to bounce off of Isaac, dealing damage to them if they hit an enemy or obstacle. Also gives Isaac the chance to deflect enemy shots.

Name: Binge Eater
Description: +1 Red Heart Container and fully heals Isaac. Item pedestals also offer a random food item. Picking up a food item temporarily grants +3.6 damage and permanently boosts 2 stats.

Name: Bird Cage
Description: The first time Isaac takes damage in a room, a familiar leaps on an enemy, dealing damage and releasing a rock wave. For the rest of the room, it chases enemies similar to  Dead Bird.

Name: Bird's Eye
Description: Gives a chance to shoot fires alongside tears that block enemy shots and deal damage to enemies that touch them.

Name: Birthright
Description: Grants a character-specific effect that enhances their special abilities.

Name: Blood Bombs
Description: Grants a Red Heart container and restores 5 hearts. Bombs leave behind damaging red creep. Isaac can place   Bombs at the cost of half a heart if he doesn't have any.

Name: Blood Oath
Description: Stabs Isaac at the beginning of each floor, draining his   Red Hearts. Increases damage and speed for the floor based on the amount drained.

Name: Blood Puppy
Description: Spawns a familiar that chases enemies. After killing enough enemies, it becomes more powerful but will also try to hurt Isaac. Attacking it returns it to normal.

Name: Bloody Gust
Description: The first 6 times Isaac takes damage on a given floor, he gains Speed and Fire Rate for the rest of the floor, up to a maximum of +1.02 and +3.00, respectively.

Name: Boiled Baby
Description: Gives Isaac a familiar that fires chaotic bursts of tears in all directions.

Name: Bone Spurs
Description: Enemies spawn floating bones on death, which block shots and damage/repel enemies that touch them.

Name: Booster Pack
Description: Drops 5 random cards.

Name: Bot Fly
Description: Spawns an orbiting fly familiar that fires shielded tears at incoming enemy projectiles.

Name: Brimstone Bombs
Description: +5   Bombs. Bombs fire four  Brimstone lasers in the cardinal directions upon exploding.

Name: C Section
Description: Replaces tears with fetuses that chase down enemies and deal contact damage. Each shot requires a brief charge up.

Name: Candy Heart
Description: Gives Isaac a permanent stat boost whenever he heals with   Red Heart pickups.

Name: Card Reading
Description: Spawns two portals at the beginning of each floor that each lead to either the  Boss Room,  Treasure Room, or  Secret Room.

Name: Consolation Prize
Description: Increases Isaac's lowest stat and drops either 3   Coins, 1   Bomb, or 1   Key depending on what Isaac has the least of.

Name: Cracked Orb
Description: Unlocks doors and reveals a random room on the map when Isaac takes damage.

Name: Cube Baby
Description: Spawns an ice cube familiar that slides around when walked into. It slows and deals contact damage, freezing monsters it kills.

Name: Dad's Note
Description: Sends Isaac on an Ascent toward  Home.

Name: Dirty Mind
Description: Destroying poop spawns Dip Familiars that follow Isaac and damage enemies. Destroying different types of poop spawns different Dips with special effects.

Name: Divine Intervention
Description: Double tapping a fire key creates a shield that pushes away enemies and reflects enemy projectiles and lasers.

Name: Dogma
Description: Grants flight, +2 damage, and increases speed to 1.1. Grants enough health to have 6 full hearts, if possible. Grants the Holy Mantle effect for the room it was obtained in. Automatically given to Isaac after defeating Dogma.

Name: Dream Catcher
Description: During the transition between floors, Isaac's nightmare shows the contents of the  upcoming floor's  Treasure Room, as well as the floor's boss. Grants a   Half Soul Heart when entering a new floor.

Name: Echo Chamber
Quote: I can see see the future future future
Description: When Isaac uses a Card, Pill, or Rune, he also uses a copy of the previous three Cards/Pills/Runes he used after picking up Echo Chamber.

Name: Empty Heart
Description: If Isaac has one red heart or fewer at the beginning of a floor, he gains an empty red heart container.

Name: Evil Charm
Description: +2 luck. Provides immunity to burn, confusion, fear, and poison.

Name: Eye Drops
Description: Increases the fire rate in Isaac's left eye, causing his eyes to fire at different rates.

Name: Eye of the Occult
Quote: DMG up + range up + controlled tears
Description: +1 damage, +2 range, -0.16 shot speed. Isaac's tears can be controlled mid-flight with tear controls.

Name: Eye Sore
Description: Causes Isaac to occasionally fire extra tears in random directions while shooting.

Name: False PHD
Description: Converts good pills into bad pills and identifies all pills. Bad pills now have secondary positive effects. Grants one   Black Heart.

Name: Freezer Baby
Description: Spawns a shooting familiar that has a chance to petrify enemies, and Freezes monsters upon killing them.

Name: Fruity Plum
Description: Gives Isaac a miniature   Baby Plum familiar that propels itself diagonally around the room, firing tears behind itself as it travels.

Name: Ghost Bombs
Description: +5   Bombs. Bombs become spectral and spawn ghosts that deal contact damage to enemies and explode after 10 seconds.

Name: Giant Cell
Description: Causes Isaac to spawn micro-Isaacs when he takes damage, which chase and shoot at nearby enemies.

Name: Glass Eye
Description: +0.75 damage, +1 luck.

Name: Glitched Crown
Description: Item pedestals cycle between 5 random items before being picked up.

Name: Guppy's Eye
Description: Shows the contents of   Chests,   Fire Places,   Grab Bags, and   Shopkeepers before they're opened/destroyed.

Name: Heartbreak
Description: Grants 3 broken hearts and +0.25 damage for every broken heart Isaac has. Every otherwise fatal hit will add 2 more until Isaac has nothing but broken hearts.

Name: Hemoptysis
Description: Double-tapping a fire button causes Isaac to sneeze blood, dealing damage to enemies in front of him. Affected enemies are cursed and take more damage from  Brimstone-like attacks.

Name: Hungry Soul
Description: Enemies have a chance to spawn ghosts on death, which chase and deal contact damage to enemies and explode after a short time.

Name: Hypercoagulation
Description: After Isaac takes damage from an enemy or donates health, launches   Red Hearts from Isaac that despawn after 1.5 seconds.

Name: IBS
Description: Causes Isaac to throw poop, create buffing creep, or drop bombs while fighting enemies.

Name: Immaculate Heart
Description: Adds one Red Heart Container and fully restores health. x1.2 damage multiplier. Isaac will occasionally fire extra tears that orbit around him.

Name: Inner Child
Description: Upon death, Isaac respawns in the current room with half of a   Red Heart, a massive size down, and +0.2 Speed.

Name: Isaac's Tomb
Description: Spawns an   Old Chest at the start of each floor.

Name: It Hurts
Description: Releases a ring of tears and increases fire rate for the current room when Isaac takes damage.

Name: Jupiter
Description: +2 red Heart containers, -0.3 speed. Isaac builds speed while standing still, and releases poison gas clouds when he moves afterwards.

Name: Keeper's Kin
Description: Rocks and other Obstacles spawn blue spiders over time while in a room with enemies, and spawn two blue spiders when destroyed.

Name: Keeper's Sack
Description: Gives range, speed, or damage when buying things from a shop. Also spawns three coins and a  Key on pickup.

Name: Knife Piece 1
Description: Combined with  Knife Piece 2, creates a knife familiar that damages enemies and can open the door to the  Corpse.

Name: Knife Piece 2
Description: Combined with  Knife Piece 1, creates a knife familiar that damages enemies and can open the door to the  Corpse.

Name: Knockout Drops
Description: Adds a chance to shoot a fist tear that has extremely high knockback and confuses enemies.

Name: Lil Abaddon
Description: Spawns a familiar that charges a miniature  Maw of the Void attack while Isaac shoots.

Name: Lil Dumpy
Description: Spawns a Dumpy familiar that pushes away nearby enemies and projectiles just before Isaac is about to be hit, then falls asleep. He can be awoken by walking to him.

Name: Lil Portal
Description: A familiar that flies forward, consuming pickups in its path. Each one will increase its size and damage and spawn a Blue Fly. Every four pickups, it opens a portal that leads to an unexplored room.

Name: Lodestone
Description: Gives Isaac the chance to fire tears that magnetize enemies they hit, causing them to attract nearby pickups and enemies, as well as tears/shots from all sources.

Name: Lost Soul
Description: Creates a ghostly familiar that closely follows behind Isaac. It dies in one hit, but respawns at the start of the next floor. Each time it survives until the next floor, it rewards Isaac with   Soul Hearts,   Eternal Hearts, or an Item.

Name: Luna
Quote: The moon's blessing shines upon you
Description: Adds an extra  Secret Room and  Super Secret Room to each floor. Secret Rooms contain a beam of light that increases Fire Rate for the current floor and gives a   Half Soul Heart.

Name: Mars
Description: Dash by double-tapping the movement key, becoming invulnerable and damaging enemies. There's a short cooldown before Isaac can dash again.

Name: Member Card
Description: Adds a trapdoor to every  Shop that leads to a second shop with a unique stock and marked-up prices.

Name: Mercurius
Description: +0.4 speed. Doors stay open after entering a room, even in rooms with enemies.

Name: Mom's Ring
Description: +1 Damage. Drops a random Rune or Soul Stone upon pickup.

Name: Monstrance
Description: Isaac gains an aura that deals damage to enemies inside it.

Name: Montezuma's Revenge
Description: While firing, Isaac charges up a short-ranged Brimstone-like diarrhea beam that shoots behind him.

Name: Mucormycosis
Description: Gives Isaac the chance to fire spore tears that stick to enemies and blow up after a few seconds, dealing damage and poisoning nearby enemies and releasing more spores.

Name: Nancy Bombs
Description: +5   Bombs. Each bomb gains 1-4 random bomb synergies.

Name: Neptunus
Description: Isaac's mouth fills with tears over time while not firing, up to a cap. Holding the fire button will release all stored tears in rapid succession.

Name: Ocular Rift
Description: Gives Isaac the chance to fire tears that create rifts where they land, which damage nearby enemies and pull in enemies, pickups, and tears/shots from all sources.

Name: Options?
Description: If a room gives a reward when cleared, there will be two different rewards to chose from. Taking one causes the other to disappear.

Name: Orphan Socks
Quote: Speed up + your feet feel stronger
Description: Prevents creep and floor spikes from damaging Isaac. Also gives Isaac +0.3 speed and 2   Soul Hearts.

Name: Paschal Candle
Description: Gives Isaac a familiar that grants +0.4 Fire Rate for each consecutive room he's cleared without taking damage. The bonus stacks up to five times.

Name: Playdough Cookie
Description: Grants multicolored tears. Each color comes with a different status or tear effect.

Name: Pluto
Description: +0.7 tears. Significantly shrinks Isaac, allowing him to squeeze between objects and makes some enemy shots pass over him.

Name: Psy Fly
Description: Spawns a fly orbital familiar that chases and blocks enemy shots.

Name: Purgatory
Description: While in a room with enemies, spawns cracks on the ground. Walking over these cracks summons ghosts that launch themselves at enemies and explode.

Name: Quints
Description: The first five enemies killed in a room will spawn stationary shooting familiars where they died.

Name: Red Stew
Description: Refills all heart containers. Grants an enormous damage boost that wears off over time.

Name: Redemption
Description: If Isaac enters a  Devil Room, but leaves without taking/opening anything in it (including   Black Hearts, etc.), he gets +1 Damage and a   Soul Heart at the start of the next floor.

Name: Revelation
Description: Grants flight and two   Soul Hearts. In addition to tears, Isaac can charge up and fire a powerful holy laser.

Name: Rock Bottom
Description: Locks Isaac's attributes to their highest values reached.

Name: Rocket in a Jar
Description: +5   Bombs. If Isaac is currently firing, placing a bomb will instead shoot a fast-moving, explosive rocket in the direction he's facing.

Name: Rotten Tomato
Description: Adds a chance to fire tears that mark enemies with the Bait status effect. Enemies marked as bait are attacked by other enemies.

Name: Sacred Orb
Description: Prevents items of quality 0-1 from appearing, and items of quality 2 from appearing 33% of the time, greatly increasing the quality of items received from all item pools. Quest items are unaffected.

Name: Salvation
Description: Gives Isaac a halo that summons beams of light on enemies inside it. The halo grows larger the more times Isaac has taken damage this floor.

Name: Sanguine Bond
Description: Spawns a special set of spikes in the  Devil Room. Taking damage from the spikes has a chance to grant a reward.

Name: Saturnus
Description: Upon entering a room, a circle of tears orbits Isaac. Enemy tears have a chance to be caught in orbit, turning them friendly.

Name: Sausage
Description: Adds a Red Heart Container, fully heals Isaac, and gives +0.2 Speed, +0.5 Damage, +0.5 Tears, +2.5 Range, +0.2 Shot Speed, and +1.0 Luck. Increases the chance of encountering a  Devil Room,  Angel Room, and/or  Planetarium each by 6.9%.

Name: Sol
Description: Reveals the location of the  Boss Room. Upon defeating a boss, activates  XIX - The Sun, fully recharges Isaac's active item, grants bonus damage and luck for the rest of the floor, and removes curses.

Name: Soul Locket
Description: Gives Isaac a permanent stat boost whenever he picks up a   Soul Heart.

Name: Spirit Shackles
Description: On death, Isaac's ghost is chained to his dead body and he can continue to fight with 1/2 of a heart, returning to life after 10 seconds. After it activates, it must be recharged by picking up a   Soul Heart.

Name: Spirit Sword
Description: Instead of tears, Isaac swings a sword. Charging does a spin attack and fires a projectile, and a projectile is sometimes fired with normal swings if Isaac has no empty   Red Heart Containers.

Name: Stapler
Description: +1 Damage. Prevents Isaac from firing tears from his left eye, like   Cain.

Name: Star of Bethlehem
Description: Spawns a star familiar that slowly travels towards the  Boss Room, giving an aura that increases damage and tears and grants homing tears.

Name: Strawman
Description: Spawns a controllable   Keeper to fight enemies alongside Isaac, functioning similarly to   Jacob and Esau. If Keeper dies, he spawns 5 blue spiders and Strawman is removed from Isaac's inventory.

Name: Stye
Description: Tears fired from Isaac's right eye have +28% Damage, +6.5 Range, and -0.3 Shot Speed.

Name: Supper
Description: Grants one full Red Heart container. Heals 1 additional   Red Heart.

Name: Terra
Description: +1 Damage. Replaces tears with rocks that deal variable damage, have increased knockback, and can destroy obstacles.

Name: The Intruder
Description: A familiar burrows in Isaac's head, firing 4 slowing tears. Upon taking damage, there's a chance it will burst out of Isaac's head, spawning blue spiders and chasing enemies for the current room.

Name: The Stairway
Quote: May you get what you came for
Description: Generates a ladder at the start of every floor that leads to a unique  Angel Room shop.

Name: The Swarm
Description: Spawns eight orbital flies, which turn into Blue Flies after they block a shot. Each time a room is cleared, spawns another orbital fly.

Name: Tinytoma
Description: Gives Isaac a   Teratoma orbital that blocks shots, deals contact damage, and splits into smaller versions of itself upon taking damage. The smaller versions break into blue spiders.

Name: TMTRAINER
Quote: ZZaZZ ZZdZZiZZmZZhZZ ZZvZZ ZZoZZ ZZ ZZsZZlZZhZZsZZoZZaZZiZZ
Description: Causes all future items to be "glitched", granting them completely random effects.

Name: Tooth and Nail
Description: Isaac periodically turns into a spiked statue, briefly becoming invulnerable and dealing contact damage.

Name: Tropicamide
Description: +2.5 Range, Increases tear size.

Name: Twisted Pair
Description: Spawns two familiars that float on either side of Isaac and fire tears that use his tears, range, shot speed, and tear effects, and scale with damage.

Name: Uranus
Description: Isaac shoots ice tears, which slow enemies and freeze monsters they kill. Frozen enemies slide away and explode into ice shards when touched.

Name: Vanishing Twin
Description: Spawns a familiar that becomes a clone of the floor's boss when entering the  Boss Room. Defeating it drops an extra item.

Name: Vasculitis
Description: Enemies explode into tears upon death, which inherit the effects of Isaac's tears.

Name: Vengeful Spirit
Description: After taking damage, spawns an orbital wisp that lasts for the entire floor, up to a maximum of six. They fire tears but do not block shots.

Name: Venus
Description: Adds one red Heart container. Heals 1 additional   Red Heart. Enemies near Isaac become charmed.

Name: Voodoo Head
Description: Spawns an additional  Curse Room on each floor. Curse Rooms have improved layouts.

Name: Worm Friend
Description: Gives Isaac a   Nerve Ending familiar that burrows out of the ground to grab and deal damage to enemies over time.
